page.title: 13Alston Bowling Club, A.Moor
page.content: The Bowling Club was first formed in 1930 and was re-opened in 1982. They use the bowling green on Fairhill. The season is fron May untill Septermber, depending on the weather and the club plays matches, home and away, against other clubs. There are {35 members}who pay a seasons subscription of{Â£7}(Â£2 for junior members) and they have a club night every Tuesday evening. They have a committee. Members of the public may use the green whenever they like at a fee of 30p per session. The club has its own woods which can be used.
